title: S17 Ep3: Ghost Hunters: Taps Returns w/ Jason Hawes
itunes:title: Ghost Hunters: Taps Returns w/ Jason Hawes
description:
Since 2004, there has been one name that the world has associated with paranormal investigating on television, Ghost Hunters!  It has been a name that has become synonymous with paranormal investigation itself! Ghost Hunters is back on Discovery Plus with a new season, and Ghost Hunters/TAPS founder Jason Hawes joins Darkness Radio to talk about the new episodes, new investigating techniques, and new guest stars you'll see this season! 

Don't have Discovery Plus yet? Sign up here and find out how to get a free trial!: discoveryplus.com
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
